nodes.text: The Krawg were a sentient species that lived in the galaxy. At some point during the reign of the Galactic Empire, a group of Krawg pirates raided credits from the planet Mykapo and later used them to pay the bounty hunter Sana Starros for a crate of Imperial blasters with the promise she would deliver them twelve more. However, she turned around and turned them in as the thieves to the Empire.
